bibl.title: The Death Declarations of Roman Egypt: A Re-appraisal.
bibl.note: Death declarations: provenance and seasonal distribution. - The seasonal incidence of deaths and death declarations. - The Wilcken hypothesis. - Geographical variation? - Coverage by death declarations. - Weaknesses of the Wilcken hypothesis. - Alternative explanations.
bibl.seg: SCHEIDEL Walter, The Death Declarations of Roman Egypt: A Re-appraisal.

Death declarations: provenance and seasonal distribution. - The seasonal incidence of deaths and death declarations. - The Wilcken hypothesis. - Geographical variation? - Coverage by death declarations. - Weaknesses of the Wilcken hypothesis. - Alternative explanations.
